sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"install_plan":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"return fd_data.flow_var.install_plan + \u0027 {\\n \"id\": \"\u0027 + fd_data._3__for_each.item.install_key + \u0027\",\\n \"type\": \"\u0027 + fd_data._3__for_each.item.type + \u0027\",\\n \"load_demo_data\": false,\\n \"notes\": \"\u0027 + fd_data._3__for_each.item.name + \u0027(\u0027 + fd_data._3__for_each.item.app_id +\u0027)\",\\n \"requested_version\": \"\u0027 + fd_data._3__for_each.item.version + \u0027\"\\n },\\n\u0027;\n"}}
